page.title: 11Ceilidhs in Haddenham
page.content: An Interview. What is a{ceilidh?}This is a{folk {dance,}for anyone to come and join in. There will be{folk dancing, singing and{display teams. What gave you the idea? For a long time I ran a folk song club in Harrow, and when I moved to Haddenham I felt it would be a good idea to run a {monthly ceilidh}in the{large village {hall. When did they start? The first ceilidh was on the first Saturday in{December, {1972 How many people go? We have about{250 who come every month. Have you ever planned to hold a festival like they have a Towersey? No, I have no plans for a large festival. We have a{full day ceilidh in{December}which is a big event,{full {of music and dance.
